Reliability experience correcting confusionI was suspicious after ordering a fire blanket.  Prepared Hero charged my credit card for two blankets and I didn't receive any. Potential disaster diverted with our Prepared Hero ClothI purchased Prepared Hero for each of our daughter’s families for Christmas a year ago. Of course I got one for our home as well.While a son-in-law (contractor) was replacing a microwave above our gas stove, our daughter was helping. To keep any debris from getting into the cracks and crevices of our stove top we covered it with a handy dandy drop cloth.Very soon after the work began we all smelled gas!! Our daughter got off the stove top, where she had been “laying” to help with said microwave. There was a small hole in the drop cloth that was being burned. Obviously we had bumped the burner knob which turned on & we had a little fire. Little because I immediately grabbed my Prepared Hero cloth which did what it was created to do. Although the flame was small, it could have been a disaster. Again, thank you for selling to wonderful product!!Victoria (Vicki) SmithDate of experience: April 15, 2024

A Must Item In Your Home!Thanks for your hard work in promoting fire safety. I've given each of my family members a PREPAREDHERO FIRE BLANKET as one of their Christmas presents. Date of experience: December 24, 2024
